summary: This week's release brings Greenhouse Mode for feature flags, a glass makeover for the domains page, and a new way to see your features in account settings. I also migrated client-side auth to Better Auth and fixed a handful of dark mode and mobile touch target issues.

features: make feature names clickable links to help articles (#770)
migrate client-side auth to Better Auth (#769)
add Features card with waystones for Rings, Trails, Curios
add /panther-strike skill for focused issue hunting
add Greenhouse Mode with Cultivate UI for feature flags (#771)
add AdminHeader component and migrate Forage (#772)
fixes: fix Semgrep exit code handling for GitHub Actions
add passkey endpoints to origin-only CSRF validation
rename Analytics sidebar item to Rings
use correct GroveAuth API URL for registration
update Heartwood entry for passkeys-first auth
replace hardcoded colors with semantic classes for dark mode
remove duplicate CSS variable definitions causing dark mode issues
use GET method for generate-register-options endpoint
rename CDN Uploader to Images in admin panel
correct dark mode muted text color in UI design tokens
skip Heartwood login page when provider is specified
resolve multiple quick-win issues across Landing and Arbor
increase saturation for light mode muted text colors
resolve usage stats error by getting limits from tier config
docs: add repository snapshot and release summary for v0.9.94
chores: add detailed error logging for registration
